Class MainCustomerModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.MainCustomerModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MainCustomerModel

    public class MainCustomerModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainCustomerModel
    This class is responsible for searching for products and updating the store product list for the customers.

      • searchProduct

        public java.util.ArrayList<GamingMerchandise> searchProduct(int price,
                                                            java.lang.String tempConsoleType,
                                                            java.lang.String name)
        This is a search method for Customers. The actions of this method are logged It consists of 3 different types of searches: Search for products below a certain price Search for products with a specific name Search for products with a specific console type they can be used on
        Specified by:
        searchProduct in interface MainCustomerModel
        Parameters:
        price - int price and below
        tempConsoleType - String console type
        name - String name of the product
        Returns:
        ArrayList of gaming merchandise

      • addDemand

        public void addDemand(java.lang.String value,
                      int amounto,
                      java.lang.String value1,
                      java.lang.String value2,
                      DateTime dt,
                      int type)
        This adds a new demand to the Customer's demand list and updates the log file too.
        Specified by:
        addDemand in interface MainCustomerModel
        Parameters:
        value - String name of the product
        amounto - int amount of the product
        value1 - String comment
        value2 - String console type
        dt - DateTime time of arrival
        type - type of product, 1 = video game, 2 = console, 3= accessory
